title: OFFICIAL INFORMATION drop-down values verification
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps:
When I scroll down to the bottom of the page 
And I click on the OFFICIAL INFORMATION footer drop-down
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following links:
Official Info
About MLB
Team Information
Official Rules
Replay Review Regulations
UmpiresAdvertise with Us
Press Releases

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should land on "/official-information" rules page
THEN I should land on "/official-information/about-mlb" page
THEN I should land on "/team" page

THEN I should land on "/mlb-images/image/upload/mlb/" page
AND I should see a PDF file loading with all the rules
THEN I should land on "/rules/replay-review" page
THEN I should land on "/official-information/umpires" page
THEN I should land on "/sponsorship" page
THEN I should land on "news/topic/mlb-press-releases" page

title: Verify HELP/CONTACT US drop-down menu items navigate to correct urls
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps:
When I scroll down to the footer section of the page
And I click on the HELP/CONTACT US footer drop-down
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following options:
Accessibility Information
Auctions Customer Service
Harassment Policy
Help/Contact Us
MLB App FAQs
MLB.TV Help Center
Shop Help

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then I should land on "/official-information/accessibility" page
Then I should land on "https://auctions.mlb.com/" page
Then I should land on "/official-information/harassment-policy" page
Then I should land on "https://support.mlb.com/s/" page
Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/apps/mlb-app/faq-apple" page
Then I should land on "live-stream-games/help-center" page
Then I should land on "https://www.mlbshop.com/customer-help-desk" page

title: Verify MORE MLB SITES & AFFILIATES drop-down menu items navigate to correct urls
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps:
When I scroll down to the footer section of the page
And I click on the MORE MLB SITES & AFFILIATES footer drop-down
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following options:
'MLB Players Alumni Association', 'MLB Players Association', 'Minor League Baseball', 'MLB Network',
'Baseball Assistance Team', 'Player Resource Center', 'Tickets.com', 'YES Network', 
'Australian Baseball League', 'World Baseball Classic', 'sabr.org', 
'College Baseball Hall of Fame', 'Golden Spikes Award', 'USA Baseball', 'LasMayores.com', 
'MLBTogether.com', 'AllStarGame.com', 'MLB.com/Kids', 'MLB Photostore',
'PlayBall.org', 'MLB Educators'


NOTE: INITIAL TEST SAID "Player Resource Center" should be "Players Resource Center"

custom_steps_separated.content: When I select 'MLB Players Alumni Association'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then I should land on "/baseball-assistance-team" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "/player-resource-center" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab
Then I should land on "https://www.milb.com/" page

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/network" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/baseball-assistance-team" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/player-resource-center" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab
Then I should land on "https://www.tickets.com/" page

Then I should land on "https://www.yesnetwork.com/" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab
Then I should land on "https://theabl.com.au/" page

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/world-baseball-classic" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://sabr.org/" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

custom_steps_separated.content: When I select 'College Baseball Hall of Fame'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/college-baseball-hall-of-fame" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://www.usabaseball.com/golden-spikes-award" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://www.usabaseball.com/" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab
Then I should land on "/es" page

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/mlb-together" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab
Then I should land on "/all-star" page
Then I should land on "/play-ball" page
Then I should land on "https://photostore.mlb.com/" page

Then I should land on "/play-ball" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

Then I should land on "https://www.mlb.com/mlb-educators" page
AND the page should open in a new window/tab

title: Verify CAREERS dropdown menu items navigate correctly
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps:
When I scroll down to the footer section of the page
And I click on the CAREERS footer drop-down
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following options:
'Careers Home'

custom_steps_separated.content: When I click on Careers Home link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then I should be taken to "/careers/home" page

title: Verify Dropdowns are clickable and have data
custom_steps: AND I click on a dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the length of the dropdown is greater than 0

title: Verify Dropdown Link is clickable and navigates correctly
custom_steps:
AND I click on a tab
AND I click on the first dropdown element in this tab
custom_expected: THEN the page navigates to the link specified in the first dropdown element

title: Verify Footer is Visible
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on a MLB page
custom_steps: AND I scroll to the footer location
custom_expected: THEN I should see the footer

title: Verify Text of Legal Links
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps: When I scroll down to the bottom of the page
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the following links:
Terms of Use
Privacy Policy
Legal Notices
Contact Us
Do not Sell or Share My Personal Data

title: Verify URLS of Legal Links
custom_preconds: Given I am on the MLB.com homepage
custom_steps:
When I scroll down to the bottom of the page

AND I see the following links:
Terms of Use
Privacy Policy
Legal Notices
Contact Us
Do not Sell or Share My Personal Data
custom_expected:
Each link should redirect to the proper endpoint

  '/official-information/terms-of-use',
  '/official-information/privacy-policy',
  '/official-information/legal-notices',
  'https://support.mlb.com/s/',
  'https://privacyportal.onetrust.com/webform/53a301ae-6882-46f9-af93-24f64f792aee/3251a424-8286-4725-9313-603f12c85a49'
